name: Out of Control Knight
description:
Out of Control Knight

A gameboy puzzle game made with GBStudio. 1-bit art pack from Kenney.

Web Controls MoveArrow KeysInteract/ChooseZCancel SelectionXPause/Save MenuEnterTeleportRight Shift
Gameboy Controls MoveDirection KeysInteract/ChooseACancel SelectionBPause/Save MenuStartTeleportSelect
